summary: A young man attempts to fight the system in an entertaining account of bureaucracy amok and the tyranny of red tape.
cast: Salvador Wood|Silvia Planas|Manuel Estanillo|Gaspar De Santelices|Omar Alfonso|Carlos Ruiz de la Tejera|Richard Suarez|Luis Romay|Elsa Montero|Tania Alvarado|Pedro Pablo Astorga|Laura Zarrabeitia|Roberto Gacio|Alicia Bustamante|Rafael Díaz|Carlos Gargallo|Rolando de los Reyes|Fausto Rodríguez|Rafael Sosa|Rolando Vidal
keywords: slapstick comedy|red tape|bureaucracy|new latin american cinema|social satire
title: La muerte de un burócrata
